entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 11 March 2023
